thread.title: Endur ID Announces the Launch of a Robust New UK Website and a Newly Updated US Website
thread.title_full: Endur ID Announces the Launch of a Robust New UK Website and a Newly Updated US Website - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Endur ID Announces the Launch of a Robust New UK Website and a Newly Updated US Website
text:
Endur ID has announced the launch of a brand new UK based website.
 NOTTINGHAM, ENGLAND, September 16, Endur ID has announced the launch of a brand new UK based website. This new website allows customers to view the full scope of the European product offerings along with the ability to request samples.
The website is easily maneuverable and user friendly, allowing customers to easily find the information they are looking for. The Resources page clearly outlines how to order product and highlights multiple industry related resources, which is particularly helpful for organizations that are part of the NHS.
In addition to launching the UK site, Endur ID has fully updated their US site to include all new products. With the addition of Accessory and Software sections it is even more clear that Endur ID offers much more than just a product, but rather a full solution for patient/ inmate identification.
On both sites there is direct access to Endur ID's blog which provides useful articles related identification in the industries of Healthcare, Corrections and Behavioral Health.
Endur ID encourages customers to visit these websites for up to date product and industry information.
US customers please visit- www.endurid.com
UK customers please visit- http://endurid.co.uk/
About Author: Endur ID was founded in 2003. We entered into the Patient Identification Market with the goal to manufacture and distribute the finest hospital Identification Wristbands and Media available. In 2012 we entered the Inmate Identification Market, in 2013 we entered the Behavioral Health Market and in 2014 we expanded again, this time introducing a European product offering.
Endur ID offers wristbands that are durable, easy to use, and easy to wear and are produced using standard desktop printers. We have also developed our relationships with our partners so we can also offer the finest software and hardware products as well -- delivering the most comprehensive solution on the market.
